entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
